import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Search, FileText, CheckCircle, XCircle, Clock, Filter, Download, Share2, BarChart2, Users, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; const RecruiterDashboard: React.FC = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('verify'); // Mock data const verificationStats = { totalVerified: 1_245, pending: 32, verified: 1_178, rejected: 35, }; const recentVerifications = [ { id: 1, candidate: 'Amit Patel', certificate: 'B.Tech in Computer Science', institution: 'National Institute of Technology', date: '2023-05-14', status: 'verified', }, { id: 2, candidate: 'Priya Sharma', certificate: 'MBA in Finance', institution: 'Indian Institute of Management', date: '2023-05-13', status: 'pending', }, { id: 3, candidate: 'Rahul Verma', certificate: 'B.Arch', institution: 'School of Planning and Architecture', date: '2023-05-12', status: 'rejected', }, { id: 4, candidate: 'Neha Gupta', certificate: 'M.Sc in Data Science', institution: 'Indian Statistical Institute', date: '2023-05-11', status: 'verified', }, ]; const filteredVerifications = recentVerifications.filter(verification => verification.candidate.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || verification.certificate.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || verification.institution.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ); return (

{/* Search and Filter */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} />
{/* Tabs */}
{/* Verification Table */}
{filteredVerifications.map((verification) => ( ))}

{verification.certificate}
{verification.institution}

); }; export default RecruiterDashboard;
